name: Battin' Bats
description:
Controls:

  • Tab - Lock mouse
  • Esc - Unlock mouse
  • WSAD - skate forward/ turn left & right
  • LeftMouse - Swing Bat / exit vending machine menu
  • Space - Jump / Purchase from vending machine

Bat bats and collect vending machine upgrades and see how far you can get in this speed based mini rougelite!

*some tips

-You hit MUCH harder and have more control the faster you are moving

-Don't forget you have multiple jumps!

-You can choose which power ups you want to buy at vending machines

-Try hitting enemy bullets, these also do much more damage depending how fast you're going

Follow me on twitter! ---> https://twitter.com/banYongthom
